abstract: Editorial calls for independent analysis of numerous irregularities in New York City Comptroller John Liu's fund-raising operations, saying he must be held accountable for his own finances before he can be entrusted with those of entire city.
snippet: It is troubling that there are questions about numerous irregularities in the fund-raising operations of New York City’s top financial officer.
lead_paragraph: It is troubling that there are questions about numerous irregularities in the fund-raising operations of New York City’s top financial officer.

headline.main: John Liu and His Campaign Books
headline.print_headline: John Liu and His Campaign Books
headline.seo: John Liu and His Campaign Books
